import React from 'react'; import './LocationDetailCard.scss'; import RemoveLogo from "../../../../assets/icons/Icon-kebab-default.svg" export default function LocationDetailCard( {inventory} ) { return (
ITEM

{inventory.name}

​
LAST ORDERED

{inventory.lastOrdered}

​
LOCATION

{inventory.city}

​
QUANTITY

{inventory.quantity}

​
STATUS
{inventory.isInstock ?

In Stock

:

Out of Stock

}
​
​
​
) }
